channel.title: Control Center Changelog
channel.description: Control Center Beta 3 brings new improvements to the app.

item.title: Version 0.2 (Beta 3)
item.description:
• Added a new Software Update feature, allows user to update to the latest version available.
  • Improved performance and speed significantly, reduced CPU and Memory usage.
  • Fixed app crash when opening Spotify and iTunes/Music at the same time.
  • Added support for displaying song artwork (Spotify only) instead of music player icon.
